Control Name: 9.10. Ensure that 'HTTP Version' is the latest, if used to run the web app (Not Scored)
Control Statement: Using the latest HTTP version for web apps is recommended in order to to take advantage of security fixes, if any, and/or new functionalities of the latest version.
